name: mr-mustache-codespace
postCreateCommand: bash -lc 'set -e; cd /workspaces/mr.mustache/mr-mustache-assistant || true; if command -v npm >/dev/null 2>&1; then npm install || true; if command -v vsce >/dev/null 2>&1; then vsce package || npx --yes @vscode/vsce package || true; else npx --yes @vscode/vsce package || true; fi; for f in *.vsix; do if [ -f "$f" ]; then code --install-extension "$f" || true; fi; done; fi; echo Devcontainer ready'
